newsitem.title: GERMANY: Results of Bundesbank poll on rates/repo, Dec 3.
newsitem.headline: Results of Bundesbank poll on rates/repo, Dec 3.

text.p: Following are the results of a poll of 10 economists on the expected outcome of this week's Bundesbank council meeting. The poll was conducted on Tuesday.
1. Will the Bundesbank cut its leading interest rates this week?
Yes 0
No 10
2. Will there be a further cut in the discount and lombard rates later this year?
Yes 0
No 10
3. Will there be another fixed tender at 3.00 this Thursday?
Yes 10
No 0
4. Do you expect the Bundesbank to abolish the minimum reserve requirements on repos this Thursday?
Yes 3
No 7
Detailed results of the poll as follows:
Economist 1. 2. 3. 4.
Ralf Kugelstadt, UBS Frankfurt No. No. Yes. No.
Stephen Lewis, London Bond Broking No. No. Yes. No.
Gerhard Grebe, Bank Julius Baer No. No. Yes. Yes.
Steven King, James Capel, London No. No. Yes. No.
Hugh Roberts, Nat West Markets No. No. Yes. No.
Ulrike Kastens, TCM Duesseldorf No. No. Yes. No.
Lutz Wiegand, Bayerische Vereinsbank No. No. Yes. Yes.
David Brickmann, Yamaichi Int.Europe No. No. Yes. No.
Klaus Baader, DMG London No. No. Yes. Yes.
Keith Edmonds, IBJ Internaitonal No. No. Yes. No.
--Frankfurt Newsroom, +49 69 756525
